website_summaries.verdict: Has all the bells and whistles, but they aren't always reliable.
pros: Features smart technology you can monitor from your device, 5-in-1 functions to measure various weather conditions, and bright screen that is easy to read
Alerts through text and email deliver urgent weather warnings
cons: Though the price is on the high side, it's not always accurate
The smart hub is a great concept when it works, but known to lose connectivity and doesn't work in all areas

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on the wind guage
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a 4 in one guage this product would be alright, but in 7 months the bearing in the wind gauge started making noise and soon wouldn't turn at under about 15 mph. when I called support they told me to spray the bearing with WD 40, their manual advised graphite. now (less than a year) the bearing has all but seized up. There is apparently no other support from the manufacturer. From feedback I have read it is obvious that the manufacturer knows that there bearing is a problem. If you are interested in Wind Speed DO NOT purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Weather reporting doesn't work outside of US
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit so that I could have a personal weather station for weather underground. It appears that the unit won't do that outside the US. Since that is not documented anywhere I call the product description incomplete at best and fraudulent at worst. The parameters of a product should be specified and accurate. I contacted product support and a week later I received a reply that you can't set the location outside of the US.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goss

customer_reviews.title: does not share data with PWS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item and will send back after finding out that it does not send data via PWS. This is important if you want real time information if you have a smart timer for your irrigation or sprinkler system. I will end up spending more money on one that does. Too bad that as a major brand it keeps you locked out from using it's true potential .
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Connecting between cellphone and weather station is very difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Everything went well with assembling and mounting PRO +. I connects wirelessly to Display readily. Connecting to cellphone or similar device is Error ridden, can't do it without support, which is not available during nights and weekends or holiday season. Instruction manuals have grammatical errors and use use unclear and undefined terminology. Terminology use in online support is not always consistent with printed manual. Temperature and wind direction reading are not calibrated accurately and there is no explanation of how to change. Snow and freezing rain stick to it. Still a nice product. Made in China, poorly documented. I recommend looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert P.

customer_reviews.title: no support
customer_reviews.text: no support! spent entire day trying to make work and still not satisfactory. advertised as being able to talk to "live" support person...discontinued the line. think i know why!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very clear installation instructions and very easy to install all components, 5 in 1 sensor, display station an AcuRite Access work great. AcuRite app works great, you can access data from anywhere. OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SUPPORT. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Rosellini

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We did not require Tech Support for setup nor have we had the station long enough to comment on battery life, so I've given each of those ratings only 3 stars at this point, but 5 stars overall. The station appears to provide accurate readings, looks fascinating on our deck, has an awesome display screen offering a wide variety of real time and historical info, no problems with networking connections/setup, has a great app for your remote device to check your backyard weather anytime from anywhere, components are easy to set up provided you're the type who can follow written instruction verbatim....who could ask for more from a personal weather station? We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Belfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for my weather-addicted Dad
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present last year for my dad, who is famous for calling home when he's out to see what the weather is. Now he can just check it using the app on his phone! Very large, bright, easy-to-read display in the house is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ML Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive Unit
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best weather station we have ever had. We haven't had it that long, but love the features! So far it is working perfectly. I have checked the information on the Display, which is easy to read, and it corresponds almost perfectly with the information from the NWS 30 miles from us. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: After trying another weather station which was terrible! The wind sensor was total crap only worked for 12 hours after mounting it on the peak out the house. I returned that POS and ordered the AcuRite and have been very impressed! I had it 60 days now and its been nothing but perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: As advertised......good quality.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised......good quality. First unit I received failed but Amazon warranty replaced it quickly and easily. Replacement unit works fine. Great way to observe and track the weather at your location.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Boater Guy

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy and it appears to be working great!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the tabletop monitor support which was flimsy. This was a replacement for a previous Monitor that Someone knocked off my table and broke the screen. I do like let this one is color and easier to read. The backyard unit is working fine and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chance

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is advertised as.
customer_reviews.text: This weather station works great Really making use of heat index this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Weather station
customer_reviews.text: We love this weather station! Great display and accurate weather!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: An easy to install system with many useful features.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much needed upgrade from my last AccuRite weather station. Now, I can check the weather even away from home.
customer_reviews.author: zookeeper34

customer_reviews.title: Works great wish it had been completely wireless but worked out very well
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything, but I didn't realize the screen and base weren't chargeable, simply ran power to where I wanted them and that was fixed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great weather station
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace an old similar unit. Works as expected. The app is a great new feature.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: 100% Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and easy setup. Great for the rainy season in Florida. Like it so much I Bought a second one for a gift .
customer_reviews.author: TBR

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I am Brazilian, bought to use in Brazil but in the settings there is no option Brazil. I thought it was a global company. It's only worth it if you're a US resident.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit works well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to have the distance for transmission as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Bracker

customer_reviews.title: Everything worked great, but gave false rain readings
customer_reviews.text: Would erroneously report rain when it was clear and sunny. Would do it more and more frequently. Tech support said replacing the sensor unit fixes the problem even though the table top display read correctly and the online data was wrong (I suspect the Acurite internet hub is the problem). Sent a new sensor to me and had the same problem still...
customer_reviews.author: pinerd

customer_reviews.title: Durability, product support sucks. Product support is worse!!
customer_reviews.text: Product when it worked was great. BUT, first big storm and the connectivity between display and outside station was lost never to return even after drying and new batteries.. Product support has multiple hour wait times..called multiple times over multiple days.. So am giving up! Then I got a new unit..but the app locked me out of reinitializing connection to the router..have spent inordinate time on Chats etc. Trashing the whole thing...
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but lousy customer suppport
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. Seems to work. But, there is one issue that I've been trying to resolve for almost 2 weeks. Their email support isn't working, and their "chat" support isn't working, and their customer support phone number doesn't work. I'd seriously consider going with another manufacturer, due to the "extremely poor" customer support services.
customer_reviews.author: Owl57

customer_reviews.title: Bad LCD crystals out of the box
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid for this unit, I expect perfection in the workmanship. The right bottom of the screen has crystals that come in & out. Mainly the rainfall amount. Also, the 5-in-1 unit is only about 150 feet from the unit & I get no results. I did a lot of research in finding the right weather station, this was a bit more than I wanted to pay, but I splurged hoping it would do all I wanted & be of good quality. I was wrong...
customer_reviews.author: Clif

customer_reviews.title: for price, construction could be better
customer_reviews.text: For the price, seems like fragile plastic however I cannot specifically comment on longevity and durability at this time. However disappointed- right out of box the display screen inaccurate- seems like the screen was warped as it required specific pressure point to display the text/number accurately. unfortunately about a year out- no product warrant.
customer_reviews.author: Russellbud

customer_reviews.title: don't order from the warehouse
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered it, I got an empty box from the warehouse. Second time, the mount was all busted up. I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy R.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a little tricky but product is great. Love the wifi oprion my dad lives 4 hours away and i can see his weather at his house on my phone and the wind
customer_reviews.author: sean belanger

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Weather Station
customer_reviews.text: This station is so easy to install, links up instantly and is constantly feeding updated indoor and outdoor weather info. I am astounded, much better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for Father's Day and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kier

customer_reviews.title: Wrong power adaptor.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong power adaptor was included with display. Trying to contact AcuRite to get it resolved, as I have already installed the station up high.
customer_reviews.author: tcp100Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Weather Station
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to set up. It seems my router took the opportunity to crap out. Once I got that sorted it recognized everything Still learning to follow other stations.
customer_reviews.author: James E Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and the weather station functions well. I also downloaded the Acurite app on my iPhone to get the information sent directly to my phone. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Rain gauge dont work
customer_reviews.text: The rain gauge does not work at all ever. My accurite is very spotty everyday. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Businessexpert1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this about a month ago working great so far
customer_reviews.author: Roy

product_meta.title: AcuRite Smart Weather Station with Remote Monitoring Compatible with Amazon Alexa (01012M)
product_meta.description: Weather that’s specific to your backyard. Access your data from anywhere, at any time, giving you the information you need to make better decisions every day. Use your iPhone, Android device, CPU or display for easy-to-read information in real-time. Set customer alerts to keep your home safe. Indoor and outdoor. Compatible with Alexa.
feature_bullets: Alexa compatible –say "Alexa, Ask My AcuRite about my backyard weather"
Share data with online communities like Weather Underground
Rainfall & history, wind speed & direction, outdoor and indoor temperature & humidity
American Based Company in Lake Geneva, WI, USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars190 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Access^Color Display for 5-in-1 Sensor Data^PRO+ 5-in-1 Weather sensor^mounting bracket^debris filter^mounting hardware^instruction manual
